headline: How Investors May Respond To Aptiv (APTV) 2026 Guidance And Multi‑Billion‑Dollar Buyback Completion
summary: In early February 2026, Aptiv PLC reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$5,153 million and net income of US$138 million, issued first-quarter and full-year 2026 guidance, and disclosed progress on a share buyback that has retired 46,521,279 shares for US$2,921.5 million. The combination of softer quarterly profitability, fresh earnings guidance for 2026, and an extensive completed repurchase program provides a clearer view of how Aptiv is balancing growth investment with...

headline: A Look At Aptiv (APTV) Valuation After Earnings Guidance And Buyback Update
summary: Aptiv (APTV) shares were in focus after the company paired its fourth quarter 2025 results with fresh earnings guidance for 2026 and confirmed substantial progress on its multi year share repurchase program. See our latest analysis for Aptiv. Those quarterly results, fresh 2026 guidance and the confirmation of a large buyback update came as Aptiv’s share price reached $85.20, with a 90 day share price return of 7.97% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 27.16%. However, the 3 year and 5...
